skills.description: Removes all debuffs from all allies. Places two 15% [Continuous Heal] buffs on all allies for 2 turns. Places two 5% [Poison] debuffs on all enemies for 2 turns.

general: PRIORITY OFFENSE T6: WARMASTER (A1 'Dark Sphere' is single-hit AoE attack - 60% proc per skill for 4% boss MAX HP / 6% dungeon boss MAX HP damage). Giant Slayer is INCORRECT for Bad-el-Kazar (no multi-hit skills).

PRIORITY SUPPORT T6: Master Hexer (CRITICAL for Poison extension - A2 places 2x Poison debuffs for 2 turns, Master Hexer extends to 3 turns = 50% more damage), Lasting Gifts (CRITICAL for Continuous Heal extension - A2 places 2x Continuous Heal for 2 turns, Lasting Gifts extends to 3 turns = 50% more healing), Eagle Eye (CRITICAL +50 ACC for Poison consistency - need 250+ ACC Clan Boss, 200+ dungeons).

KEY MASTERIES: Warmaster (A1 single-hit AoE), Master Hexer (Poison extension - CRITICAL for damage), Lasting Gifts (Continuous Heal extension - CRITICAL for sustain), Eagle Eye (ACC for Poison), Lay on Hands + Healing Savior (healing boost for A1 + Continuous Heal), Cycle of Magic (A2 spam for cleanse/heal/poison cycling).

SYNERGIES: A1 heals all allies by 20% of damage dealt (benefits from Lay on Hands + Healing Savior + Bloodthirst). A2 cleanses all debuffs + places 2x Continuous Heal + 2x Poison (3-turn CD when booked). Passive grants all allies +20% damage vs Poisoned targets (does NOT boost Warmaster/Giant Slayer damage - does NOT stack with multiple Bad-el-Kazars). Master Hexer extends Poison duration (2→3 turns) for massive damage increase. Lasting Gifts extends Continuous Heal duration (2→3 turns) for 50% more healing.

CLAN BOSS SPECIFIC: AVOID Rapid Response and Arcane Celerity masteries (break speed tunes in unkillable/CA teams). Build for 220+ SPD (speed-tuned), 250+ ACC with Eagle Eye, HP%/DEF% for survivability. Master Hexer + Lasting Gifts are CRITICAL for maximizing Poison damage and healing sustain.
ARENA SPECIFIC: 25% C.RATE aura for all allies. Build for 300+ SPD (Arena 8/10 rating), Unshakeable for tank builds, RES for disruption avoidance. Cycle of Violence + Kill Streak for farming.

UNIQUE MECHANICS: A1 heals based on TOTAL DAMAGE DEALT (not per target) - build ATK% for more healing in addition to HP%/DEF%. Passive +20% damage boost for allies vs Poisoned targets synergizes with Poison teams (Frozen Banshee, Elenaril, Narma, etc.) but does NOT boost Warmaster/Giant Slayer damage.

mechanics_advisory: Bad-el-Kazar is one of the best universal support champions in RAID (Clan Boss 10/10, Dungeons 10/10, Faction Wars 10/10, Doom Tower 9/10, Arena 8/10). A1 'Dark Sphere' is single-hit AoE that benefits from Warmaster (60% proc, 4% boss MAX HP). KEY STRENGTHS: (1) Complete support kit - A1 AoE damage + 20% heal based on damage dealt (benefits from Lay on Hands + Healing Savior), A2 cleanses all debuffs + places 2x Continuous Heal + 2x Poison (3-turn CD when booked), (2) Passive grants all allies +20% damage vs Poisoned targets (does NOT boost Warmaster/Giant Slayer, does NOT stack with multiple Bad-el-Kazars), (3) 25% C.RATE aura for all allies (all battles). REQUIRES Master Hexer (CRITICAL - extends Poison 2→3 turns = 50% more damage) + Lasting Gifts (CRITICAL - extends Continuous Heal 2→3 turns = 50% more healing) + Eagle Eye (+50 ACC for 250+ total Clan Boss, 200+ dungeons). A1 heals based on TOTAL DAMAGE DEALT (not per target) - build ATK% for more healing. CLAN BOSS: AVOID Rapid Response/Arcane Celerity (breaks speed tunes). Build 220+ SPD (speed-tuned), 250+ ACC, HP%/DEF% for survivability. Synergizes with Poison teams (Frozen Banshee, Elenaril, Narma) and benefits from Counterattack (Skullcrusher, Martyr). ARENA: 300+ SPD, Unshakeable for tank, RES for disruption avoidance. Top-tier for Undead Hordes Faction Wars and universal PVE content.
